UrbanLC 0.0.1 documentation
UrbanLC 0.0.1 documentation
Back to top

API#

urbanlc.utils.export_geotiff(img, save_path, ...)

Export a NumPy array as a GeoTIFF file.

urbanlc.utils.open_at_scale(path, ...)

Open a .tif file and downsample it by a constant factor.

urbanlc.utils.open_at_size(path, ref)

Open a .tif file and downsample it to match the size of another .tif file.

urbanlc.downloader.base.BoundingBox(bounds, ...)

BoundingBox class for representing geographic bounding boxes.

urbanlc.downloader.base.BaseDownloader(root)

BaseDownloader class serving as an abstract base class for various data downloaders.

urbanlc.downloader.esa2021_downloader.ESAWorldCover(...)

ESAWorldCover class for downloading ESA WorldCover 10m v100/v200

urbanlc.downloader.landsat_downloader.Landsat_Collection2(...)

Landsat_Collection2 abstract class for downloading Landsat data from GEE

urbanlc.downloader.landsat_downloader.LandsatMSS(...)

LandsatMSS class for downloading DN (digital numbers) data of Landsat 1 - 5 (using MSS sensor)

urbanlc.downloader.landsat_downloader.LandsatTM(...)

LandsatTM class for downloading surface reflectance data of Landsat 4 - 7 (using TM sensor)

urbanlc.downloader.landsat_downloader.LandsatOLITIRS(...)

LandsatOLITIRS class for downloading surface reflectance data of Landsat 8 - 9 (using OLI/TIRS sensor)

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.confusion_matrix(...)

Calculate the confusion matrix based on predicted and ground truth data.

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.accuracy(m)

Calculate accuracy from a confusion matrix.

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.producer_accuracy(m)

Calculate producer's accuracy from a confusion matrix.

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.user_accuracy(m)

Calculate user's accuracy from a confusion matrix.

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.cohen_kappa(m)

Calculate Cohen's Kappa coefficient from a confusion matrix.

urbanlc.analyze.metrics.get_class_distribution(...)

Calculate the class distribution of land cover map in a specified data path at a specified resolution.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.get_esa_colormap()

Retrieve the colormap and normalization for ESA (European Space Agency) WorldCover 2021 v200 labels.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.plot_class_distribution(data)

Plot the class distribution based on input labels.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.show_esa_label()

Display the ESA (European Space Agency) WorldCover 2021 v200 label colormap and descriptions.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.plot_land_cover(img, ax)

Plot land cover data on a given matplotlib axis.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.plot_landsat(img, ...)

Plot RGB band of the given Landsat image on a given matplotlib axis.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.plot_change([...])

Create a video plot to visualize changes over time based on image paths or a root directory.

urbanlc.analyze.visualizer.visualize_data_batch(...)

Visualize a batch of data containing Landsat images and corresponding ground truth land cover maps.

urbanlc.model.base.LCC(save_path[, legends, ...])

Abstract base class for Land Cover Classification (LCC) models.

urbanlc.model.baseline.BaselineLCC(...)

BaselineLCC abstract class for LCC with classical ML

urbanlc.model.baseline.MSSBaseline(*args, ...)

MSSBaseline class for LCC with classical ML using data from Landsat 1 - 5 (MSS sensor)

urbanlc.model.baseline.TMBaseline(*args, ...)

TMBaseline class for LCC with classical ML using data from Landsat 4 - 7 (TM sensor)

urbanlc.model.baseline.OLI_TIRSBaseline(...)

OLI_TIRSBaseline class for LCC with classical ML using data from Landsat 8 - 9 (OLI/TIRS sensor)

urbanlc.model.dataloader.get_dataloader(...)

Get a PyTorch DataLoader for Landsat and ESA2021 datasets.

urbanlc.model.dataloader.parse_paths(root, ...)

Parse paths of files matching a certain pattern in the given root directory, excluding any paths that contain the specified exclusion keywords.

urbanlc.model.dataloader.CustomRasterDataset([...])

Custom raster dataset class for training DL model

urbanlc.model.dataloader.ESA2021([root, ...])

ESA World Cover 2021 v200 dataset for training/inference

urbanlc.model.dataloader.Landsat(root, ...)

Landsat dataset for training/inference

urbanlc.model.deep_learning.DeepLearningLCC(...)

Deep-learning-based Land Cover Classification (LCC) model.

urbanlc.model.deep_learning.MSSDeepLearning(...)

Deep-learning-based LCC for Landsat 1 - 5 (using MSS sensor).

urbanlc.model.deep_learning.TMDeepLearning(...)

Deep-learning-based LCC for Landsat 4 - 7 (using TM sensor).

urbanlc.model.deep_learning.OLITIRSDeepLearning(...)

Deep-learning-based LCC for Landsat 8 - 9 (using OLI/TIRS sensor).

urbanlc.model.download.download_model(...)

Downloads a pre-trained model from Google Drive.

urbanlc.model.train_utils.combine_prediction(...)

Combine predictions from partitioned patches into a complete prediction.

urbanlc.model.train_utils.load_checkpoint(...)

Load model checkpoint, including model state, optimizer state, scheduler state, and epoch.

urbanlc.model.train_utils.save_checkpoint(...)

Save model checkpoint, including model state, optimizer state, scheduler state, and epoch.

urbanlc.model.train_utils.segment_satelite_image(img)

Partition a satellite image into patches of specified size and stride.

urbanlc.model.train_utils.set_seed(seed)

Set random seeds for reproducibility in random, numpy, and PyTorch.
